title: Where can I see the timeline for ranked reward release?
body: You guys have thrown a bunch of stipulations regarding access to these rewards but havent answered a single question regarging their release timeline. The only info i can see is that you state they will be unlocked "in the coming months" yet the skin and chroma have been released in the client.

replies.body:
Xaeros took time out of his way to offer you solid assistance, the tone reciprocated back to him isn't very cool.  Patch notes and the client splashes may show new content, but it doesn't mean that it will show up on the first day.  Rewards, for example, still need to be distributed per the help desk thread. It's going to take time to send them out to every eligible player so while we can estimate we can't offer a specific date.  

Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page as well for the other skins once they're ready to roll out.

T0ff4n!

The best place to get info on the season rewards is probably the [2017 Ranked Rewards Help Desk]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk).

>**REWARD DISTRIBUTION**

>All rewards will be distributed in the coming months after the end of season. We’ll give further updates as rewards are sent out regarding timelines!

> * Some rewards may appear faster than others so don’t worry if you don’t get them all at once.

It looks like we'll just have to wait on one of the "further updates" for now :)

I literally put that exact phrase in my original post. What I asked is why the patch notes stated the skin would be available on release of 7.22 and it shows it in champ select but is not accessible. Im sorry you struggled so hard with my question. If you managed to reread it would you like to try and answer it again?

Hey T0ff4n,

Sorry that my original answer wasn't satisfactory.

From the [Patch 7.22 notes](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-722-notes#patch-upcoming-skins-and-chromas):

>**The following skins will be released in patch 7.22**:

>Mecha Rengar
>Victorious Graves (Gold+ Ranked Reward)
>Lancer Rogue Blitzcrank
>Lancer Paragon Blitzcrank

Please note that the phrasing is "**in** patch 7.22", which means that the skins will be "unlocked" sometime during Patch 7.22, before Patch 7.23+.

This is actually very common in League patches. Content that is included in a patch is not always available the day the patch goes live, but rather unlocked sometime during that patch. You can commonly see skins show up with a new patch that are not selectable or purchasable immediately.

If you _really_ want to get into reasons why things are sometimes done this way, you can read up on things like [Continuous Delivery](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Continuous_delivery) and [Feature Toggling](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feature_toggle).
